pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Antares' Results Processing // Process results generated by 'Antares', a powerful open source software developed by RTE (Rseau de Transport dlectricit) to simulate and study electric power systems (more information about 'Antares' here: https://github.com/AntaresSimulatorTeam/Antares_Simulator). You can see the results of several ANTARES studies here : http://bpnumerique.rte-france.com/. This package provides functions to create new columns like net load, load factors, upward and downward margins or to compute aggregated statistics like economic surpluses of consumers, producers and sectors.
